languages.text: "Не думаю, что примадонне нашей пьесы подобное под силу. Пусть я и чувствую в ней отголоски предков и скрытую угрозу... Она не сможет умертвить свой дом. А посему тебе не запугать меня, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что примадонне нашей пьесы подобное под силу. Пусть я и чувствую в ней отголоски предков и скрытую угрозу... Она не сможет умертвить свой дом. А посему тебе не запугать меня, мон-кай".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что примадонне нашей пьесы подобное под силу. Пусть я и чувствую в ней отголоски предков и скрытую угрозу... Она не сможет умертвить свой дом. А посему тебе не запугать меня, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "I do not believe that the star of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "I do not believe that the star of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「僕らの劇の主人公にそんなすごい力があるとは思えない。彼女の中で先祖の声が響き、隠れた脅威が存在していると確かに感じる…でも一家を死なせることはできない。つまりだ、モン＝ケイ、君は僕を脅せなかったってこと」
languages.original_text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."

traits.locale_text: 「僕らの劇の主人公にそんなすごい力があるとは思えない。彼女の中で先祖の声が響き、隠れた脅威が存在していると確かに感じる…でも一家を死なせることはできない。つまりだ、モン＝ケイ、君は僕を脅せなかったってこと」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “我不相信这场戏的主角有能力做到这件事情。我确实感觉到了祖先的回声，以及她心中隐藏的威胁……可她不可能成为整个家族的刽子手。因此，猴子，你的话吓不倒我。”
languages.original_text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."

traits.locale_text: “我不相信这场戏的主角有能力做到这件事情。我确实感觉到了祖先的回声，以及她心中隐藏的威胁……可她不可能成为整个家族的刽子手。因此，猴子，你的话吓不倒我。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Je ne crois pas la protagoniste de notre petite pièce capable d'une telle prouesse. Je sens en elle la menace à peine voilée d'échos ancestraux... mais jamais elle ne pourra semer la mort dans sa propre maison. Votre tentative d'intimidation a échoué, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne crois pas la protagoniste de notre petite pièce capable d'une telle prouesse. Je sens en elle la menace à peine voilée d'échos ancestraux... mais jamais elle ne pourra semer la mort dans sa propre maison. Votre tentative d'intimidation a échoué, mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «No creo que la protagonista de nuestra obra sea capaz de ello. Percibo ecos ancestrales y una amenaza oculta en su interior... pero no podría causar la muerte de su casa. De modo que, mon-keigh, no has conseguido intimidarme».
languages.original_text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."

traits.locale_text: «No creo que la protagonista de nuestra obra sea capaz de ello. Percibo ecos ancestrales y una amenaza oculta en su interior... pero no podría causar la muerte de su casa. De modo que, mon-keigh, no has conseguido intimidarme».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ich glaube nicht, dass die Hauptfigur unseres Stücks dazu fähig ist. Ich spüre Echos ihrer Vorfahren in ihr, genau wie verborgene Gefahr ... doch sie könnte nicht zum Tod ihres Hauses werden. Und daher, Chem-Pan-Sey, ist es Euch nicht gelungen, mich zu entmutigen."
languages.original_text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube nicht, dass die Hauptfigur unseres Stücks dazu fähig ist. Ich spüre Echos ihrer Vorfahren in ihr, genau wie verborgene Gefahr ... doch sie könnte nicht zum Tod ihres Hauses werden. Und daher, Chem-Pan-Sey, ist es Euch nicht gelungen, mich zu entmutigen."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Piyesimizin başrolünün elinden böyle bir şey geleceğine inanmıyorum. İçinde atalarından kalma yankılarla gizli saklı bir tehdit sezsem de... Hanesinin sonunu getiremez. Kısacası bana gözdağı vermeyi başaramadın mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "I do not believe the protagonist of our play is quite capable of that. I do sense ancestral echoes and hidden menace within her... but she could not become the death of her House. And thus, mon-keigh, you have failed to daunt me."

traits.locale_text: "Piyesimizin baş karakterinin elinden böyle bir şey geleceğine inanmıyorum. İçinde atalarından kalma yankılarla gizli saklı bir tehdit sezsem de... Hanesinin sonunu getiremez. İşte bu yüzden bana gözdağı vermeyi başaramadın mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
